data.title: 18RS Passed One House
data.text: House Resolution 1 A RESOLUTION establishing the 2018 membership of the Kentucky State House of Representatives. House Resolution 2 A RESOLUTION adopting the Rules of Procedure for the 2018 Regular Session of the House of Representatives. House Resolution 3 A RESOLUTION extending an invitation to pastors of Frankfort churches to open sessions of the 2018 Regular Session with prayer. House Resolution 4 A RESOLUTION directing the appointment of a committee to wait upon the Governor. House Resolution 11 A RESOLUTION urging the United States Congress to amend Title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the Government Pension Offset Provision and the Windfall Elimination Provision. House Resolution 17 A RESOLUTION adjourning the House of Representatives in honor and loving memory of Isaac "Ike" Martin Slusher. House Resolution 24 A RESOLUTION urging Governor Matthew Bevin to open all Kentucky National Guard armories as warming centers if temperatures fall below twenty degrees Fahrenheit and the wind chill is below zero. House Resolution 25 A RESOLUTION adjourning the House of Representatives in honor and loving memory of Judge Richard J. FitzGerald.
